alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 10:40PM EST until January 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Rain changing to snow and slippery roads expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches are expected with the highest totals across the northern half of Newton and Jasper counties. * WHERE...Newton and Jasper Counties. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin as rain before transitioning to snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
